isis.stitle: HEAT VENTILATION AIR CONDITIONING (HVAC), Thermostatic Expansion Valve (TXV) System, March 2007 and Later - SPECIAL TOOLS - ULTRAVIOLET LAMP LEAK DETECTOR

svcproc.title: ULTRAVIOLET LAMP LEAK DETECTOR
svcproc.para: An ultraviolet leak detector is used with phosphor dye to detect very minute leaks. Leak Detector (ZTSE4618) is for use under all ambient lighting conditions, except direct sunlight (refer to Figure 59). It uses a special self-ballasted bulb, which eliminates the need for an external transformer. When this light is shined on a suspected area, leaking refrigerant will be visible as a bright yellow-green glow. The leak detector kit includes the accessories needed to inject dye into other systems.
